new-features: Option to disable reading secret from cross namespace for PVC creation
Auto populate the object store endpoint in the storage classes based on 'storage class' and 's3 provider' parameters for Satellite clusters
Support for Wasabi & AWS s3 provider on Satellite clusters
fixes: Default values for CPU request and CPU limit are updated to 100m & 500m respectively
Default values for Memory request and Memory limit are updated to 128Mi & 500Mi respectively
Integrate keyprotect root key crn while creating buckets
Define PriorityClasses for driver and plugin pods
